channel.title: Linux compile error?
channel.description:
Ok so I have a file called runme that runs my server..
Here is the error (run me is delow)
[code] -bash-3.1# ./runme Error: JAVA_HOME is not defined correctly. /bin/javaot execute /root/java/javak1.4.2_18/ [/code]
and my runme is
[code] export PATH=$PATH:/rscd/apache-ant-1.7.0/bin:/root/java/javak1.4.2_18/bin/ export JAVA_HOME=/root/java/javak1.4.2_18/ export ANT_HOME=/rscd/apache-ant-1.7.0/bin/ ant compile ant demonikp2p > /dev/null 2>&1 [/code]
Whats the problem look like?

item.title: Linux compile error?
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Yes I see that, but I have set it corectly in my runeme file, that the exact location of the java installation. Is there another place I have to add JAVA_HOME or something? I just pretty much unpacked Java SDK and thats pretty much it…

Read full topic

item.title: Linux compile error?
item.dc:creator: @Krypton1 Krypton
item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

You obviously didn’t set the Java_home path correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux compile error?
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Ok so I have a file called runme that runs my server…

Here is the error (run me is delow)

-bash-3.1# ./runme
Error: JAVA_HOME is not defined correctly.
/bin/javaot execute /root/java/javak1.4.2_18/

and my runme is

export PATH=$PATH:/rscd/apache-ant-1.7.0/bin:/root/java/javak1.4.2_18/bin/
export JAVA_HOME=/root/java/javak1.4.2_18/
export ANT_HOME=/rscd/apache-ant-1.7.0/bin/
ant compile
ant demonikp2p > /dev/null 2>&1

Whats the problem look like?

Read full topic
